Posts.Content: You are a champion!,for me who was diagnosed with stage 11 in 2009 and knowing when this beast recur it can be stage 1V it give me hope to read stories like this.I sending you my hope and prayers that this beast never recur again.

Posts.Content: Hi mardee i am on Tamox from 2010,when i feel deprest i listen to music give it a try it  might work for you too!
Posts.Title: tamoxifen & depression

Posts.Content: Yes!about 9 months after finish rads,my teeth problems start all of them was loose ,and when the doc pull them out  it was full of infection,so after pulling out.two my dentist decide to let them all pull out.two weeks after that i end up in Hospital after all the test i was dignosed with gastritis Oh my!i was so sick could not passed any stool or urinate,they think i did swallow some of the blood.But today i am fine.
